text: Taane ga helekai, “Au e de hei eau maa goe ga gaamai nia bahihadu silber e mana. Au e hagalee loo e hai dagu mee huaidu gi di tama di king. Gidaadou huogodoo gu longono telekai hagamaamaa a di king ne helekai adu gi goodou mo Abishai mo Ittai dela boloo, ‘Goodou gi dee hai dahi mee huaidu gi tama daane go Absalom.’
